comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body: Test failures due to HTTP error 503 (Service Unavailable) in package restore. Since these are trivial changes, I will not restart tests.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@xtqqczze Please add new commit and replace `[Fact, TestPriority(11)]` with `[Fact]` to pass CI. https://github.com/iSazonov/PowerShell/blob/54d3ae20c56b845d12414780cfcfcbc4e4684337/test/xUnit/csharp/test_PSConfiguration.cs#L971 (We merged old PR and get the minor regression.)

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body:

Yep looks likes a conflict between #13496 and #13872, `TestPriority` is now named `Priority`.
